text:
Yesterday, we sent a letter to @NYCMayor & @nycHealthy regarding the pace of  #covid19 #vaccine distribution.

In it, among other points, we express support for @NYCComptroller @scottmstringer ‘s call for for 24/7 vaccination sites. 

Read it here -
https://t.co/fH1zoyzsHX https://t.co/2rbiZnhCIT
